fr.escape.game.entity

Class EntityContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.escape.game.entity.EntityContainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EdgeNotifier, KillNotifier, Updateable

    public final class EntityContainer
extends java.lang.Object
implements Updateable, KillNotifier, EdgeNotifier

    A composite which handle large bunch of Entity, a container for Entity in the World.

    This Container implements KillNotifier and EdgeNotifier for removing Entity.
